column4: If I wanted to start dilly dallying with a virtual computer( say the windows XP partition on this hardrive) where should I start?
system>prefrences> remote desktop?
Wrong topic :)
ok, I misunderstood the question then. :)
ubuntu-marketing?
7.04 stands for April, 2007
http://rute.2038bug.com/rute.html.gz
WOW! is that guide current? if it is... just... wow.
it is dated, but it is still useful.
friggin amazing. Thankyou so much. That is going to be a wonderful read :)
yep, I keep it at the top of my bookmarks.
might take a few weeks but still. Thanks!
weeks!? :)
the Rute manual is Red Hat based, so it focuses on RPMS, not debs, but RPMs can be converted to debs, with Alien.
any other comprehensive guides?
nothing I've come across that compares to Rute.
I will read it with caution then. Thankyou :)
Yes, and also, RH uses lilo as the boot loader, not grub. But 95% of stuff in there is still relevant.
I understand your enthusiasm, I wish I had found Rute five years ago.
This guide is extremely comprehensive.
Yep, If you can read and comprehend it and "weeks" my hat is off to you. :)
so you think it will take longer eh? :)
I don't try to read it, I just use it as a reference. :)
